description.value:
The dragon smashes itself into the ground, cratering the earth in a 10-foot deep, 60-foot wide emanation. Creatures in the area are thrown into the air and must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:|options:area-effect,damaging-effect,inflicts:prone] save with a DC equal to the dragon's Avalanche Breath.

Critical Success The creature lands on its feet.

Success The creature lands @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Failure The creature lands prone and takes @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))d6[untyped]]{1d6 damage per every two levels} of the dragon.

Critical Failure As failure, and the dragon can make a jaws Strike against the creature as a free action. It can only attack one creature that critically failed its save.
